title: [传送|综合|管理]SendItems —— 发送物品★让玩家们互相发送物品吧【汉化】[1.10+]
author: _DIM_
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 17:50 编辑 

介绍什么是SendItems？SendItems就是发送物品，他可以让手中的物品以邮件的形式发送给玩家厌倦传送来传送去的给物品？厌倦玩家刚好下线，只能通过锁箱子来给物品？那就用这款插件吧~（只有第一句是原话，其他的楼主自己写的- -）SendItems is a plugin that lets you send an item to someone.

Commands:
/senditem- Send an item to with the message. 发送物品
/slist- Show list of items you received. You can receive an item by clicking on theitem name. 列出你收到的物品，通过点击可以获取物品（类似于快递箱，然后你要去收件）
/sget- Receive an item that someone sent to you (This command should be used with/slist because an argument of this command accepts hashcode)当有人给你发送物品时可使用这个指令进行接收
Permissions:
senditems.senditem- Makes you use all commands of this plugin.如果有这个权限，让你可以使用这个插件的所有命令

Usage:

For instance, A name of the item someone sent to you(Hummit) is Enchantment Table. 1 is the quantity of the item, and Hummit is the name of the player who sent an Enchantment Table.
If you click on Enchantment Table, you can receive an Enchantment table.

You can get information about the item if you hover your mouse over the name of item, and you can see the message that was sent with the item if you hover your mouse over the name of sender.
例如，有人给你发送了一个叫EnchantmentTable的物品，1代表的是物品数量，Hummit指的是发件人
你点击这个Enchantment Table，你就会接收到一个Enchantment Table当你将鼠标移动到这里时，会显示出这个物品的信息。（这个作者也不会英文，他写得很吃力，我翻译的更吃力- -那么长一句话，简短的意思就是这样了。）
